question: BACKGROUND : 23 yr old healthy heterosexual maleENCOUNTER: less than 10 seconds insertive vaginal intercourse, 30 second oral with premiscuos stranger of unknown hiv statusSYMPTOMS: 2 WEEKS post exposure (PE). tightness in neck muscles3 WEEKS PE: constipation, acute testicular tenderness, tingling in hands, feet and mouth for 5-10 mins and disapeared. Hot flashes in the cold, a metalic taste in mouth (no oral thrush) dry mouth , erectile dysfunction (difficult to maintain errection, hard to ejaculate)4 WEEKS PE: hot flashes in cold (once only), tight neck muscles5 WEEKS: slight fatigue, small bone aching and stiffnes in one hand and one feet6 WEEKS: dryness of eyes, twitching of eye muscles (at night)6 WEEKS to 10 WEEKS: just night small eye twitching on and off, slight bone aches in hands alternates from hand to hand... very small like 2 out of 10PHYSICIAN VISIT:physical exam good, no fevers , no swollen lymph nodes, no rashes,normal blood count, no thyroid problems, no diabetes, no abnormalities in testicle under ultra soundLAB WORK:25 day Post exposure HIV  PCR DNA- NEGATIVE6 week HIV-ELISA - NEGATIVE8 week COMPLETE STD CHECKUP(including herpes): ALL NEGATIVE10 week HIV ELISA- NEGATIVEQUESTION:Are my symptoms strongly indicative of herpes or hiv?..... do i neeed further testing for herpes?
title: I need an expert opinion..HIV and HERPES WORRY SYMPTOMS, TESTING
